## rons@dev-ubu-03$ perl -e 'use strict; use warnings; use English qw( -no_match_vars ); use IO::File; my $rgb_qr = qr{^(\d+)\s+(\d+)\s+(\d+)\s+(.+)$}; my $rgb_fn = "/etc/X11/rgb.txt"; my $rgb_fh = IO::File->new($rgb_fn, "r") or die "failed to open $rgb_fn: $OS_ERROR"; my(%h2n, %n2h); while (my $line = $rgb_fh->getline) { my($r, $g, $b, $n) = ( $line =~ $rgb_qr ); next unless $n; $n = lc($n); my $h = sprintf("%2.2x/%2.2x/%2.2x", $r, $g, $b); $h2n{$h} = $n; $n2h{$n} = $h; } $rgb_fh->close; use Comm::Quack; 0 and quack { \%n2h, \%h2n }; my $xterm_qr = qr{(\d+)[[:space:]:]+([a-f0-9/]+)}sm; my $xterm_fn = "$ENV{HOME}/bin/colortest"; my $xterm_fh = IO::File->new($xterm_fn, "r") or die "failed to open $xterm_fn: $OS_ERROR"; while (my $line = $xterm_fh->getline) { chomp($line); my($i, $h) = ( $line =~ $xterm_qr ); next unless defined($i) and defined($h); my $n = $h2n{$h} || ""; my(@h2d) = map { hex } split("/", $h); my $d = sprintf("%03d/%03d/%03d", @h2d); use Comm::Quack; 0 and quack { $i, $h, $d, $n }; printf("%3d\t%s\t%s\t%s\n", $i, $h, $d, $n); } $xterm_fh->close;' > ~/.bash/etc/colors.txt
